articles.title: Ministers urged to wait for new Covid vaccines such as Sputnik V to be approved by European Medicines Agency - The Times
articles.description: Ireland should wait for vaccines such as Sputnik to be approved by the European authorities before considering them to speed up the programme, a specialist in vaccines and immunology said.Tom Cotter
